name: HabitFlow
description: A simple habit tracker app where users can add daily habits, mark them complete, and visualize their streaks over time
main_user: Anyone wanting to build positive habits
language: Python Flask backend, SQLite database, React frontend
done: Users can create and view their habits
Users can mark habits complete for today
Users can see their streak count for each habit
App shows a visual calendar of completed habits
architecture_notes: Simple Flask app with SQLite, single server deployment
expected_scale: Single user or small groups, ~100 habits max
